programme.desc: Coverage of the Tour of Spain (also known as Vuelta A España). This renowned road cycling race is part of the UCI World Tour. Follow teams of world-class cyclists as they compete in-and-around Spain.

programme.title: FIA WEC: Lone Star Le Mans - Highlights
Šanhajas "Masters". Alisters Kārters vs Kairens Vilsons
programme.desc: The Shanghai Masters is a professional snooker tournament. Originally a ranking event but in 2018 it became a non-ranking invitation event. Ronnie OSullivan is the reigning champion he won the 2018 title, the first time it has been defended.

programme.title: "Vuelta a España". O Barco de Valdeorras - Alto de El Morredero (143,2 km)
programme.desc: Coverage of the Tour of Spain (also known as Vuelta A España). This renowned road cycling race is part of the UCI World Tour. Follow teams of world-class cyclists as they compete in-and-around Spain.

programme.title: Šanhajas "Masters". Alisters Kārters vs Kairens Vilsons
programme.desc: The Shanghai Masters is a professional snooker tournament. Originally a ranking event but in 2018 it became a non-ranking invitation event. Ronnie OSullivan is the reigning champion he won the 2018 title, the first time it has been defended.

programme.title: "Vuelta a España". O Barco de Valdeorras - Alto de El Morredero (143,2 km)
programme.desc: Coverage of the Tour of Spain (also known as Vuelta A España). This renowned road cycling race is part of the UCI World Tour. Follow teams of world-class cyclists as they compete in-and-around Spain.

programme.title: Londonas "Masters". Šons Mērfijs vs Kairens Vilsons
programme.desc: Dont miss a chance to see all the action and highlights from the Masters, a professional invitational snooker tournament. This snooker event is one of the most important and prestigious in the world, and it takes place every year in London.

programme.title: Новенькая
programme.desc: В элитную школу для детей богатых родителей попадает Вера - девушка из обычной семьи. Она сразу оказывается в центре запутанной детективной интриги и школьных конфликтов, и, конечно же, романтической истории. Но все не так просто: у Веры также есть тайна, и в элитном заведении она оказалась случайно...

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: Modigliani
programme.desc: The story of Amedeo Modiglianis bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

programme.title: Back in the Day
programme.desc: A young boxer is taken under the wing of a mob boss after his Mother dies and his Father is run out of town for being an abusive alcoholic.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A hybrid of animated, experimental, feature and genre film in found footage technique, with a radio phonic sound and of unexpected, almost 40-minute duration. Journalist Isidor Dukas visits the Institute for Research on Psychic Phenomena and Mental Film when a confrontation with one of the test subjects transforms a routine check into a never-ending maze. Barićs work calls into question issues surrounding artistic practices in the digital age including ideas about authenticity, simulation/replication and appropriation.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: Upon discovering that their town is up for sale, crafty Irish villagers scheme to raise the money to prevent the buy-out...

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Three friends - a reporter, an oil analyst and a financial executive - reunite after ten years and accidentally uncover one of the key, hidden reasons for what motivated the war in Iraq. The trio struggles to present evidence to major media that America invaded Iraq to force oil sales from the Euro back to the Dollar to preserve US global monetary supremacy. Against incredible odds, the team must face their pasts, find willing sources to corroborate the story, and survive the conspirators as they push to bring the truth to light.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: An epic fantasy adventure from director Chen Kaige (Farewell My Concubine). Nominated for a golden globe for best foreign language film.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Train Master
programme.desc: 62 year old Jeremiah Wilson is truly the Train Master of Willamette Western Railroad. He lives, breaths, and eats railroad. When Brett Banner, 32 year old heir to New York Eastern talks his dad into purchasing Willamette Western, there is immediately a clash between himself and Jeremiah. Jeremiah is fired by Brett two years from retirement and turns into a angry, depressed grandfather. When Bretts nine year old son Justin realizes Jeremiahs grandson Thomas can drive a locomotive, he kidnaps and holds Thomas favorite dinosaur ransom. Justin, Thomas and 3 other children board an old engine in for repairs and accidentally turns it into runaway engine causing a chain reaction of events.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Samantha and Rob live for Foolproof; their own private club where through high-tech, meticulously thought out and executed plans, they pull off the most impossible of heists - all in theory that is. Theyve never actually done it for real. But all that changes when Leo, a cutthroat British gangster, rips off their foolproof plans for a diamond heist and uses it to successfully execute the robbery. Threatening to implicate them, Leo blackmails them to pull off a robbery worth $20 million in corporate bonds.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Noble Things
programme.desc: Jimmy Wayne Collins finds himself adrift in Memphis, Tennessee. Forced to return home to the piney woods of Southeast Texas, Jimmy will face his imprisoned brother, his dying father and the demons he left behind.

programme.title: Black Water
programme.desc: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: Smita kungs un kundze
programme.desc: Garlaikots precēts pāris ir pārsteigts, uzzinot, ka abi ir slepkavas un ir sāncensīgu aģentūru nolīgti nogalināt otru.

programme.title: Cīņa ar manu ģimeni
programme.desc: Bijušais cīkstonis un viņa ģimene pelna iztiku,visā valstī uzstājoties nelielās vietās, savukārt viņu bērni sapņo pievienoties grupai World Wrestling Entertainment.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Lietains kajaka izbrauciens upē.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.desc: Pragmatisks ASV jūras kājnieks savām acīm redz Vjetnamas kara dehumanizējošo ietekmi uz saviem kolēģiem - sākot no brutālajām apmācības nometnēm līdz asiņainajām ielu kaujām Huē.

programme.title: Radio pirāti
programme.desc: Stāsts par negodīgu dīdžeju grupu, kas valdzināja Lielbritāniju - viņi spēlēja mūziku, kas raksturoja veselu paaudzi, kā arī nostājās pret valdību, kas ēterā vēlējās vien klasisko mūziku un neko citu.

programme.title: Valkīra
programme.desc: 1944. gada 20. jūlija slepkavības un politiskā apvērsuma dramatizējums, ko Otrā pasaules kara laikā veica izmisīgi renegāti Vācijas armijas virsnieki pret Ādolfu Hitleru.

programme.title: 127 Stundas
programme.desc: Filma "127 stundas" balstīta uz patiesiem notikumiem par alpīnistu Āronu Ralstonu, kuru filmā spēlē aktieris Džeimss Franko. Stāsts risinās pēc negadījuma Jūtas štata kanjonos, kad Āronu klinšu aizā iesprosto klintsbluķis, piespiežot viņa roku pret akmens sienu. Turpmākās piecas dienas jeb 127 stundas alpīnists cīnās par dzīvību un ir spiests pieņemt izmisīgu, taču drosmīgu lēmumu, nozāģējot savu roku, kas ir viņa vienīgā iespēja palikt dzīvam.

programme.title: Valkīra
programme.desc: 1944. gada 20. jūlija slepkavības un politiskā apvērsuma dramatizējums, ko Otrā pasaules kara laikā veica izmisīgi renegāti Vācijas armijas virsnieki pret Ādolfu Hitleru.

programme.title: Netīrās dejas
programme.desc: Pavadot vasaru Ketskilas kūrortā ar ģimeni, Francisa "Mazulis" Hausmana iemīlas nometnes deju skolotājā Džonijā Kāslā.

programme.title: Laika patruļa
programme.desc: "Laika patruļa" stāsta par Laika aģentu, kura dzīve ir nebeidzams ceļojums laikā, lai uzveiktu visus šķēršļus, kas stājas likuma sarga ceļā. Pēdējais uzdevums, kas aģentam uzticēts, – notvert noziedznieku, kas līdz šim pamanījies izsprukt sveikā cauri laiku laikiem.

programme.title: Meklēju draugu pasaules galam
programme.desc: Uzzinot par to, ka cilvēces pēdējie mēģinājumi apturēt gigantisko, Zemei tuvojošos asteroīdu ir izgāzušies, Dodžs (Karels) dodas savā pēdējā ceļojumā. Viņš grib sameklēt savu seno mīlestību, lai atklātu savas jūtas pirms pasaulei ir pienācis gals. Palīdzēt Dodžam viņa neparastajā misijā apņemas kaimiņiene Penija (Naitlija), kas tikko izšķīrusies no sava drauga-egoista. Kamēr varoņi tuvojas savam mērķim, pa ceļam vērojot nolemtās cilvēces trakulības, starp viņiem pilnīgi nevietā uzplaukst romantiskas attiecības.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: For the final showdown in the illustrious Great Hall, hosts James and Oliver Phelps challenge the bakers to create 6-foot-tall showpieces.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena + CUT Steakhouse. At Wolfgang Pucks gorgeous CUT steakhouse, Selena Gomez takes on two initiation tests before creating her own spicy seafood dish.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Summer Baking Championship
programme.desc: Jesse Palmer challenges the bakers to create road trip portable desserts. Then, the bakers go glamping with glam summer cobblers.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Anderson V. Voltaggio
programme.desc: Proud Texan Tiffany Derry challenges the Brawlers to two Triple Threat-inspired tasks to see if they have what it takes to go all the way.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Summer Baking Championship
programme.desc: The bakers head to the American Southwest for handheld dessert tacos and tres leches cakes that celebrate the beauty of Sedona.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena + Lemon Grove. At Chef Marcel Vignerons Lemon Grove, Selena Gomez creates a colourful dish with unusual ingredients. Will Marcel make the dish his new special?

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena + Girl and The Goat. Selena Gomez steps up her game in Stephanie Izards kitchen. For her special, Selena makes a ricotta toast inspired by cheese and crackers.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Summer Baking Championship
programme.desc: The bakers head to the American Southwest for handheld dessert tacos and tres leches cakes that celebrate the beauty of Sedona.

programme.title: The Last Day of the Dictator
Greja piecdesmit nokrāsas
programme.desc: Koledžas studente Anastasija Stīla savas saslimušās istabas biedrenes vietā dodas intervēt slaveno uzņēmēju Kristianu Greju universitātes avīzei, taču meitene nenojauš, kā mainīsies viņas dzīve. Noslēpumainajam, bagātajam un ietekmīgajam Kristianam iepatīkas Ana. Lai gan meitenes seksuālā pieredze ir visai niecīga, viņa ļaujas šai dēkai un uzzina, ka Kristiana seksuālās tieksmes pārkāpj sāpju un baudas robežas.

programme.title: Nakts un diena
programme.desc: Vientuļa sieviete lidostā satiek pievilcīgu svešinieku. Sākotnēji šķietami nevainīgā tikšanās pēkšņi apgriež viņas dzīvi ar kājām gaisā, jo svešinieks izrādās slepens spiegs. Džūna tiek ierauta galvu reibinošos piedzīvojumos un bīstamā ceļojumā apkārt pasaulei, jo viņas ceļabiedram ir jāveic ārkārtīgi atbildīga misija un jānosargā baterija, kas var kļūt par mūžīgās enerģijas avotu.
Ir 1917. gada 6. aprīlis. Bruņoto spēku vadība nolemj pretinieka aizmugurē nosūtīt divus kareivjus, kuri, ja izdotos nogādāt ziņu, glābs 1600 vīru no drošas nāves ienaidnieka slazdos.

programme.title: Ātrs un bez žēlastības
programme.desc: Pēc pilnīgas izgāšanās slepenajā misijā, kad policists Braiens OKonors atlaiž brīvībā bandas vadoni Dominiku Toreto, viņam tiek dota pēdējā iespēja. Maiami drošības iestādes jau krietnu laiku meklē pierādījumus biznesmeņa Kārtera Verones netīrajam biznesam importa un eksporta darījumu piesegā. Pierādījumu nav, izņemot Verones saistību ar nelegālajām ielu autosacīkstēm. Iefiltrējoties ielu autosacīkšu cienītāju grupā, OKonora uzdevums ir atklāt Verones saikni ar naudas atmazgāšanu, darot to, ko viņš prot vislabāk – plātīties un spiest pedāli grīdā. Taču karstgalvim ir savi noteikumi. Izbrāķējis visus potenciālos slepenās misijas partnerus, OKonors uzstāj par partneri pieņemt viņa bērnības draugu Romenu, kura kriminālā pagātne un mežonīgais autobraukšanas stils ir kā radīti slepenajam uzdevumam.

programme.title: Viena dzīve
programme.desc: Stāsts par seru Nikolasu Nicky Vintonu, kurš, būdams jauns Londonas brokeris, pirms Otrā pasaules kara sākuma izglāba vairāk nekā 600 bērnus no nacistu okupētās Čehoslovākijas.

programme.title: Suņa ceļojums
programme.desc: Suns Beilijs laimīgi dzīvo kādā fermā Mičiganā kopā ar savu "zēnu" Ītanu un viņa sievu Hannnu. Viņam pat ir jauna rotaļu biedrene – Ītana un Hannas mazmeitiņa Sīdžeja. Diemžēl kādudien Sīdžejas mamma nolemj aizvest meitenīti prom. Kad Beilija dvēsele gatavojas pamest šo dzīvi, lai sāktu jaunu, viņš apsola Ītanam, ka atradīs Sīdžeju un sargās viņu, lai ko tas prasītu. Tā sākas Beilija ceļojums cauri daudzām dzīvēm, kas piepildītas ar mīlestību, draudzību un uzticību.

programme.title: Juras laikmeta pasaule
programme.desc: Greznais kūrorts "Juras laikmeta pasaule" atrodas Kostarikas piekrastē un ir mītnes vieta ģenētiski radītiem dinozauriem, tostarp negantajam un gudrajam "Indominus rex". Kad milzīgais radījums izbēg, aizsākas ķēdes reakcija, kā rezultātā brīvībā izlaužas arī pārējie dinozauri. Tagad bijušajam karavīram un dzīvnieku ekspertam ir jāizmanto savas īpašās prasmes, lai izglābtu divus brāļus un pārējos tūristus no aizvēsturisku radījumu uzbrukuma.

programme.title: Ātrs un bez žēlastības
programme.desc: Sarīkojot Rio aplaupīšanu, Doms un Braiens sagrāva noziedznieka impēriju un atstāja komandai 100 miljonus dolāru. Tagad visi ir izklīduši pa pasauli, taču liegums atgriezties mājās padara dzīvi nepilnvērtīgu. Tikmēr Hobss 12 valstīs izseko bīstamu algotu sacīkšu braucēju bandu, kuras vadoņa nežēlīgā palīdze ir Doma mīļotā sieviete un par mirušu uzskatītā Letija. Lai apturētu noziedzniekus, ir jārada pārspēks uz ielas, tādēļ Hobss lūdz Domu savākt savu elitāro komandu Londonā. Maksa? Pilna amnestija viņiem visiem, kas ļaus atgriezties mājās pie radiem.

programme.title: Mīluļu slepenā dzīve
programme.desc: Makss (Luiss Sīkejs) ir enerģisks un sajūsmināts Džeka Rasela terjers, kurš dzīvo Manhetenas dzīvoklī kopā ar īpašnieci Keitiju (Elija Kempere). Taču viņa laimīgā dzīve pārtrūkst, kad saimniece pieņem jaunu suni Grāfu (Ēriks Stounstrīts). Makss apņemas atgūt saimnieces uzmanību tikai sev un mēģina Grāfu atstāt kādā sānielā, taču viņus ielenc kaķu banda, kuru vada Ozons (Stīvs Kūgans). Viņi tik tikko izglābj savas dzīvības, kad nākas saskarties ar pamesto dzīvnieku armijas niknumu apburošā, bet psihiski nelīdzsvarotā truša Sniegapikas (Kevins Hārts) vadībā. Šis ir Ņujorkas piedzīvojums, kurš liek Maksam un Grāfam izvērtēt savu sacensību un mēģināt izjaukt Sniegapikas atriebes plānu pret visiem dzīvnieku īpašniekiem Ņujorkā.

programme.title: Čārlija eņģeļi
programme.desc: Noslēpumainā Čārlza Taunsenda detektīvaģentūra atvērusi birojus visā pasaulē. Tās paspārnē vairāku Bosliju vadībā izveidotas Eņģeļu komandas, kurās darbojas visgudrākās, visdrosmīgākās un visaugstāk kvalificētās sievietes, kam jātiek galā ar vissarežģītākajiem uzdevumiem jebkur uz zemeslodes.

programme.title: Episkā filma
programme.desc: Episkais ķinis ir ļoti episks, par to nešaubieties! Stāsta centrā ir četri bāreņi – vienu no tiem piedzīvojumā ierauj Luvras kuratora pēctecis, otrs grib kļūt par meksikāņu brīvības cīnītāju, trešo bāreni sastopam, pateicoties čūskām lidmašīnā, bet ceturtais ir puslīdz normāls mutants no X sabiedrības. Katrs no četriem mīklainos apstākļos tiek pie zelta biļetes, kas sniedz iespēju apmeklēt šokolādes fabriku. Viens pēc otra viņi iekuļas dīvainā drēbju skapī, kas nabagus aiztransportē uz Gnārnias zemi (ar G!). Tur viņi sastop ekstravagantu pirātu kapteini, kā arī nopietnus burvestību skolas studentus un noslēdz sadarbības līgumu ar gudru, bet seksuāli norūpējušos lauvu, lai pieveiktu ļauno Balto Kuci, kas uzkundzējusies Gnārnijā.

programme.title: Es gribu dejot. Vitnijas Hjūstones stāsts
programme.desc: Līksms, emocionāls un sirdi plosošs ieskats Vitnijas Hjūstones, visu laiku labākās RandB stila popa dziedātājas, dzīvē un mūzikā, sākot no paša sākuma līdz mūzikas jomas slavas zālei.

programme.title: Ārpus kartes
programme.desc: Asa sižeta piedzīvojumu filma, kas veidota pēc populāras video spēļu sērijas, aizved mūs uz visdažādākajiem pasaules nostūriem, sekojot Neitam un Sallijam, kad viņi dodas bīstamā ceļā pēc "dižākajiem, nekad neatrastajiem dārgumiem", vienlaikus meklēdami Neita sen pazudušo brāli.

programme.title: Lūsija
programme.desc: Seksapīlā blondīne Lūsija kļūst par bīstamāko un nāvējošāko sievieti uz pasaules, apveltītu ar nepārspējamu intelektu un pārcilvēciskām fiziskām spējām. No potenciāla upura viņa ir pārvērtusies par mednieci un dodas pa pēdām tiem, kuri viņu gribēja nogalināt.

programme.title: Mīlestība un citas narkotikas
programme.desc: Megija, dodoties pie ārsta uz vizīti, iepazīstas ar Džeimiju, kurš ir ļoti izskatīgs un pašpārliecināts farmācijas firmas darbinieks. Drīz starp abiem uzvirmo kaisle, kurai viņi nolemj ļauties, bet drīz vien izrādās, ka abus saista ne tikai tas vien - abi "balodīši" ir nokļuvuši visstiprāko narkotiku - mīlestības ietekmē. Tomēr vai mīlasstāstam iespējamas skaistas beiga, ja Megija ir nedziedināmi slima?

programme.title: Īsāk sakot
programme.desc: Tedijam patīk stiept visu garumā, taču pēc kādas savādas tikšanās ar svešinieci viņš pamostas rītā pēc savām kāzām un atklāj, ka jau pienākusi kāzu pirmā gadadiena. Tedija sieva ir stāvoklī, un viņš – pavadījis laulībā gadu, no kura neatceras ne mirkli. Ik pēc pāris minūtēm Tedijs attopas gadu vēlāk un cīnās pret straujajiem laika lēcieniem, kamēr dzīve brūk viņa acu priekšā. Ar sava labākā drauga palīdzību Tedijs cenšas izprast, kurā brīdī viņa dzīve nogāja no sliedēm, un, dzīvei zibot gar acīm, mēģina piepildīti izdzīvot tos retos mirkļus, kad var atgūt sievieti, kuru mīl.

programme.title: Madagaskaras pingvīni
programme.desc: Bezbailīgie pingvīni Kapteinis, Kovalskis, Riko un Ierindnieks, kuri ir labākie spiegi, kādi jebkad izšķīlušies no olas, apvieno spēkus ar smalku slepeno organizāciju "Ziemeļvējš". Izskatīgā un brašā aģenta Slepenā vadībā viņiem kopā jāaptur ļaunais doktors Oktāvijs Brīze, kurš ir nodomājis iznīcināt pasauli.

programme.title: Bez pēdām
programme.desc: Tēvs un viņa trīspadsmit gadus vecā meita Portlendā, Oregonā, izdzīvo ideālo dzīvi. Līdz brīdim, kad neliela kļūda abu dzīves noved no sliedēm uz mūžiem.

programme.title: Viss ir patiess
programme.desc: Ir 1613. gads, un Šekspīrs jau novērtēts kā šī laikmeta lieliskākais rakstnieks. Tomēr notiek traģēdija, un viņa slavenais Globe teātris Londonā nodeg līdz pašiem pamatiem. Saguris Šekspīrs atgriežas Stretfordā, kur viņam jāsaskaras ar savu smago pagātni un nolaidīgo ģimeni. Sava vienīgā dēla Hamneta nāves vajāts, viņam ir grūtības salabot attiecības ar ģimeni. Tomēr, to cenšoties, viņš ir spiests atkal un atkal izvērtēt savas neveiksmes.

programme.title: Balerīna
programme.desc: Bāreņi Felīsija (Elle Faninga) un Viktors (Deins Dehāns) dzīvo 19. gs. Francijā, un abi mēģina īstenot savus sapņus. Viņš strādā Gustava Eifeļa birojā un grib kļūt par ievērojamu izgudrotāju. Viņa, neskatoties uz līdzekļu trūkumu, ar apkopējas Odetes (Kerlija Reja Džepsena) palīdzību tikusi uzņemta prestižajā Parīzes Operā. Felīsijas iedzimtais talants neiepatīkas viņas konkurentei Kamillai (Medija Cīglere) un pārējiem dejotājiem. Neskatoties uz grūtībām, Felīsija ir apņēmusies kļūt par Parīzes baleta zvaigzni!

programme.title: Troļļi
programme.desc: Troļļi ir mazi un laimīgi radījumi, kuri savā pasaulē nodarbojas ar dziedāšanu, apskaušanos un būšanu laimīgiem. Tomēr viņu idilli mežā pārtrauc bergeni, kuri atklāj viņu atrašanās vietu un kuri ir milzu monstri, kas ir nepārtraukti nelaimīgi. Monstri atklāj, ka viņi var kļūt laimīgi, ja apēd troļļus. Troļļi glābjas, un viņus caur slepeniem tuneļiem vada karalis Pepijs. Pēc divām desmitgadēm Pepija meita Popija organizē izsmalcinātas svinības par godu tam, ka viņi ir izglābušies. Vientulīgais izdzīvošanas speciālists Zars pret to iebilst, jo uztraucas, ka troksnis varētu piesaistīt bergenus. Viņam izrādās taisnība, un bergeni nolaupa daudzus troļļus. Popija dodas glābšanas misijā, un Zars dodas viņai līdzi, jo neuzskata, ka Popija būs drošībā. Viņi ierodas bergenu pilsētā, kur ierauga, kā bergenu karalis apēd vienu trolli. Tomēr Popijas domas ir tādas, ka šis trollis tomēr ir izdzīvojis. Viņi atklāj, kur troļļus tur gūstā un kas tos uzrauga. To uzraudzītāja ir virtuves darbiniece Bridžita, kuru ir apbūris karalis. Viņa piekrīt atbrīvot ieslodzītos un ļaut Popijai un Zaram piekļūt karalim, ja viņai būs iespēja ar karali aiziet uz randiņu. Gatavojoties randiņam, Popija un Zars sastrīdas, jo Zars atsakās dziedāt, apgalvojot, ka dziedāšana nogalināja viņa vecmāmiņu, un šis notikums padarīja viņu pelēku. Bridžita tiek sapucēta kā lēdija, un viņa kopā ar karali dodas braukt ar skrituļslidām un uz restorānu. Troļļi tomēr nespēj Bridžitu pārvērst lēdijā uz visiem laikiem, un Bridžita sāk raudāt. Viņi mēģina izglābt troļļus, taču glābšanas laikā arī Popija tiek ieslodzīta. Popijai zūd cerības, un visi troļļi paliek pelēki. Zars sāk dziedāt un atzīstas mīlestībā. Visiem par pārsteigumu, troļļiem atgriežas krāsas, arī Zaram. Troļļus taisās apēst, bet Bridžita viņus izglābj. Karalis un citi bergeni atklāj, ka viņiem troļļi nav jāapēd, lai kļūtu laimīgi. Troļļi un bergeni laimīgi sāk dzīvot saticīgi, un Popiju kronē par troļļu karalieni.

programme.title: Everests
programme.desc: 1996. gada 10. maija rītā divas alpīnistu komandas uzsāk pēdējo posmu ceļā uz Everestu, kas ir pasaules augstākā virsotne. Piepeši kalnu grēdu pārņem negaiss, un piedzīvojumu meklētājiem ceļu aizšķērso cilvēces vēsturē spēcīgākā sniega vētra. Šajos skarbajos apstākļos komandām ir jāiztur stindzinoši brāzmains vējš un mežonīgs aukstums, lai izdzīvotu gandrīz neiespējamā situācijā.

programme.title: Ātrs un bez žēlastības
programme.desc: Dominiks (Vins Dīzels) un viņa komanda domāja, ka viņi ir atstājuši noziedzīgo algotņu dzīvi aiz muguras. Viņi pieveica bēdīgi slaveno teroristu Ouenu Šo un devās katrs uz savu pusi. Bet tad Šo brālis Dekards atriebības vārdā vienu pēc otra sāk nogalināt komandas biedrus. Somāļu terorists, vārdā Džakards, un kāds šaubīgs valdības ierēdnis cenšas nozagt teroristu datorprogrammu "Dieva acs", kas var pārvērst jebkuru tehnisku ierīci par ieroci. Toreto ir atkal jāapvienojas ar savu komandu, lai cīnītos ar teroristiem, apturētu Šo un atgūtu "Dieva acs" programmu.

programme.title: Noteikumi nav svarīgi
programme.desc: Holivudā ir 1958. gads. Topošā tikumīgā aktrise Marla Mabrijs (Lilija Kolinsa) un šoferis Frenks Forbss (Aldens Ērenraihs) uzreiz iepatīkas viens otram. Dzimstošais romāns ir neveikls, jo Marla ir dievbijīga baptiste un Frenks ir saderinājies ar draudzeni kopš vidusskolas laikiem. Papildu problēmas rada viņu darba devējs, kurš ir ekscentriskais aviācijas miljardieris Hovards Hjūzs (Vorens Bītijs) un kurš ir aizliedzis personālam tikties ar aktrisēm, kuras pieņēmis darbā. Marlas un Frenka attiecības sajaucas ar Hjūza arvien dīvaināko uzvedību un liek viņiem pārvērtēt savus principus un dzīves izvēles.

programme.title: Uz nažiem
programme.desc: Uzreiz pēc astoņdesmit piektās jubilejas nogalināts detektīvromānu autors un kuplas ģimenes patriarhs Harlans Trombijs. Slepkavības izmeklēšanu uzsāk harizmātiskais un skrupulozais detektīvs Benuā Blanks, kuram acumirklī kļūst skaidrs - slepkavību ir pastrādājis kāds no Trombija plašās ģimenes locekļiem. Bet kurš tieši? Atjautības spēle uz dzīvību un nāvi ir sākusies!

programme.title: 8. jūdze
programme.desc: Jauniņam reperim no Detroitas ir grūtības visās dzīves frontēs – viņš grib gūt panākumus, taču gan draugi, gan ienaidnieki padara viņa odiseju grūtāku, nekā tā ir.

programme.title: Ir laiks
programme.desc: Kad Timam aprit 21 gads, tēvs atklāj puisim neticamu ģimenes noslēpumu: visi viņu dzimtas vīrieši spēj atgriezties pagātnē. Tims var atgriezties jebkurā savas dzīves brīdī, lai panāktu, ka viss notiek nevainojami. Puisis izlemj izmantot šīs īpašās spējas, lai iekarotu daiļās Mērijas sirdi, taču izrādās, ka īsta mīlestība var būt līdz smieklīgumam neparedzama pat tad, ja ir iespēja visu neskaitāmas reizes atkārtot no jauna.

programme.title: Inišeras Banšī
programme.desc: Kādā nomaļā Īrijas salā starp diviem ilggadējiem draugiem negaidīti pārtrūkst draudzības saites – kašķīgais vijolnieks Kolms pēkšņi nevēlas par Pedreku neko zināt. Pedreks mēģina noskaidrot, kas viņa draugam lēcies, taču tas ir un paliek noslēpums. Vienīgais, kas patiešām ir skaidrs – Kolms to domā ļoti nopietni.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Villarreal - Girona
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Basketbols: WNBA. Connecticut - Phoenix
programme.desc: Get the best moments of the Womens National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in the United States. It currently is composed of twelve teams. The regular season is played from May to September, the All Star game is played midway through the season in July and the WNBA Finals at the end of September until the beginning of October.

My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Mediterranean Life
programme.desc: Few places share the magical sparkle of the Mediterranean coastline, with many dreaming of one day purchasing property in this idyllic region. This reality series follows potential homeowners from the US as they look to find their dream property on the Med. From the extravagant luxuries of the French Riviera to the slower pace of life on the island of Sicily, each destination is engulfed in picturesque beaches, turquoise waters and unparalleled culture.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: A spin-off of My Lottery Dream Home that follows British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen as he tries to help a number of lottery winners from Europe find a perfect home. Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: Backed by the Bros
programme.desc: Jonathan and Drew help investors on the brink of financial ruin. They complete a new-build triplex thats mired in a commercial rezoning quagmire.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: A couple asks Jenn to revitalize their outdated home which contains, the most unusual bathroom shes ever seen. Jenn works with a family whose home has lots of space but no personality

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: Daphne and Ian look to reinstate one of the original chateau bedrooms that once hosted real Kings and Queens of France. They plan an ornate resto.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: Enterprising thieves tunnel underneath and up into the vault of a Lloyds Bank branch in London. When an amateur radio enthusiast intercepts their walkie-talkie chatter, they find themselves in a high-stakes cat-and-mouse game with Scotland Yard.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey and Chum are going to the Deep South, as they head to Savannah, Georgia. The trio will be enchanted by a dangerous magic trick, a spooky hotel, and an infamous gravestone, as they wheel and deal in the most haunted city in America.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified with David Duchovny
programme.desc: When is Mission: Impossible more than a movie? Newly uncensored evidence reveals the extreme lengths elite operatives have gone—from deep-sea wiretaps to hand-deploying A-bombs in enemy territory—all to complete the mission.

programme.title: Holy Marvels with Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: Since the dawn of humanity, rituals have marked our passage from life to death. From the burials of biblical heroes, to prehistoric mummification and fiery funerals, we delve into the surprising origins and evolution of these sacred customs.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: There is intriguing evidence history suggesting the existence of intelligent defence systems seemingly protecting Earth. Could all of these weapons have originated from... an alien arsenal?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: In Boston, a 25-foot tidal wave of... Molasses? A dancing plague that kills 100 people? A surgery with a 300% mortality rate? We search the globe for the strangest and most bizarre deaths on record.

programme.title: Buried: Knights Templar Revealed
programme.desc: Join our hosts, Mikey Kay and Garth Baldwin, as they investigate whether the famed and mysterious Knights Templar were really disbanded and destroyed in 1307 or if they survived, taking the Holy Grail with them. The historical detectives journey through the middle-east in an attempt to uncover new evidence of the true fate of this secretive organization. Starting off in the holy city of Jerusalem, the team explore archaic tunnels and a safe house that could have been used to smuggle religious relics to safety. Their exploratory travels then take them to the ancient city of Acre and on to Cypress to search for clues about a covert Templar mission. Secret Templar codes lead the unit to a monastery in Spain which might be able to prove that the knights survived the fateful arrests of Friday the 13th, 1307.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: This documentary series features testimony from Luis Elizondo, former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge at the Pentagons mysterious program, The Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). This secretive military department was tasked with researching and investigating Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) which included numerous video clips, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. In this six-part series, Elizondo speaks out about his concerns for national security and the Pentagons lack of response to these potential threats. Episodes include fighter pilots from the USS Nimitz describing their terrifying encounter with a UFO; the lights seen in the sky above a New Jersey turnpike; and a saucer-shaped craft observed over Chicagos OHare airport.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?

programme.title: Hunting Hitler

programme.title: The Lake Erie Murders
programme.desc: Coming from the beautiful environs of Lake Erie, straddling the border between the US and Canada, this true life crime show focuses on the more sinister and gruesome tales of some of the regions darkest and deadliest crimes. We explore baffling and mysterious murder cases such as that of the 1989 kidnapping and murder of 10-year-old Amy Mihaljevic which provoked much speculation and intrigue in the area and which is still an open case. Each hourlong episode delves into the case history, analyzes the facts and evidence and carefully examines the detection procedures and how each suspect was cleared of suspicion. Subsequent episodes detail four additional deadly crimes that were solved by local law enforcement.

programme.title: The Playboy Murders
programme.desc: A waitress catapults to stardom when featured in a Playboy pictorial. But after a surprise goes wrong, she becomes a victim in a double murder.

programme.title: Mean Girl Murders
programme.desc: In Anchorage, a rebellious teen forms a fast friendship with a bubbly newcomer. The picture-perfect friendship ultimately ends in unspeakable tragedy.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: Documentary series following police officers across the USA as they put their lives on the line to enforce the law. Using real footage from the officers body cameras, we show just how deadly routine checks can be, with law enforcement officials having to think on their feet and make split-second decisions to potentially save their, or someone elses, life. From knife-wielding maniacs to brutal shootouts, the series highlights the importance of our police departments. With interviews from the officers involved adding context to the footage, Body Cam Cops gives viewers unprecedented, exclusive access to what life is truly like in the line of duty.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Serial killers hiding in plain sight and murderers living perfect family life. American Monster reveals the truth behind some of the most shocking crimes thats happened around the country. Through dramatization and never-seen-before footage, each case shows you that anyone can be a monster, but it also allows us to understand how they became monsters. Through testimonies of family members and friends, along with home videos showing them at their most innocent, this true-crime drama gives us a closer look at the double life of some of the most ruthless monster in American history.

programme.title: Border Control Sweden
programme.desc: At Arlanda, a man tries to sneak 30 million in cash abroad. At the border in Skåne, a car full of alcohol gets pulled over.

programme.title: Border Control Sweden
programme.desc: Customs check for drugs at a party cruise with hundreds of young people. Plus, an angry woman sheds her clothes at Arlanda airport.

programme.title: Border Control Poland
programme.desc: Security and Customs are working hard on the border of Poland constantly trying to prevent illegal items from entering the country. They are on the 24/7 watch detecting crimes and preventing them from happening. Dogs are great helpers when it comes to sniffing up hidden contraband.

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: Two young women who dream of big success as television anchors are just embarking on their careers when their plans come to a violent end. What happened to them?

programme.title: Still A Mystery

programme.title: Deadliest Mums and Dads
programme.desc: When a father gets into financial difficulty and is charged with fraud, he cant see a way forward. Facing jail time, he makes a horrifying decision.

programme.title: Deadliest Mums and Dads
programme.desc: The shocking story of a double murder carried out in revenge after Chrissie Chambers leaves her partner - and the brave young girl who escaped.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: Documentary series that tells true and often tragic stories of the crimes perpetrated on the internet and of deception and manipulation triggered by online interactions - from predators lurking behind Facebook profiles to maniacs searching for their victims in chat rooms. Series includes re-enactments, comments from law enforcement personnel, true-crime experts, psychologists and interviews from friends and families of the victims. Rare episodes feature victims who were extremely lucky to survive and are able to tell us what happened.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Chilling true-crime documentary series that explores the relationships that ended with fatal result. Series features archive footage, dramatic reconstructions and interviews with family, friends and law enforcement. From a suspicious carbon monoxide incident, a parrot who became an eyewitness to murder, to a spouse with a spiraling gambling addiction, and a motorcycle accident that is not what it seems, each episode will uncover the breaking point in each of these complex and toxic relationships and tell a tragic tale of what happens when love becomes lethal.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.title: The Vanishing Women
programme.desc: Six women from the town of Chillicothe in Ohio have been missing or found dead since 2014. This true-crime series follows the law enforcement as they investigate the cases, and try to discover the truth and stop the possible serial killer.

programme.title: Who Killed Jane Doe?
programme.desc: A true-crime documentary series examining murders of women and the two aspects of each case; the detectives pursuing the killer and the family struggling to come to terms with their loss. With dramatised reconstructions to portray the events as they happened, each episode focusses on a different, chilling murder, listening to both the professional and personal side of a murder investigation. Whilst detectives scour crime scenes for evidence and clues to identify a victim, a family is waiting in vain for the impending announcement, aware of who the victim could very well be. A unique murder documentary series that offers a reminder of the delicate and poignant side to each investigation.

programme.title: The Interrogator
programme.desc: True-crime documentary series in which retired Houston Detective Fil Waters, known as the legendary Interrogator, as he has throughout his law enforcement career been able to maintain one of the top case closure rates in the county at over 95%, revisits some of his most shocking and famous cases. Using a combination of re-enactments, interviews, and actual interrogation footage, viewers get to go inside the gripping cases Detective Waters solved, as he reveals how he has gotten some unexpected criminals to come clean.

programme.title: The Interrogator

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Crime documentary series that examines homicide investigations using unfiltered footage, including body-cam, surveillance and interrogation-room footage, giving viewers a chance to follow a case from beginning to end. The series will give viewers a chance to experience how homicide cases are conducted, from the initial crime scene investigations by body cam, to home security tapes, to interrogation room footage of real confessions. Real tapes of the investigations will be combined with interviews with friends, family members, and law enforcement directly involved in the case.

programme.title: Border Control Sweden
programme.desc: A man gets aggressive when his bags are being checked. Plus, Alex discovers a canister and suspects that it might contain drugs.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера. Родители юного гения не разделяют увлечения сына наукой: его мать очень религиозна, а отец, бывший футбольный тренер, предпочитает проводить вечера в компании пива и телевизора. Со сверстниками тоже не ладится, ведь Шелдона куда больше детских игрушек интересует, где можно взять обогащённый уран для научных экспериментов.

programme.title: Теория больших денег
programme.desc: Гений математики Михаил Нефедов преподает в университете теорию вероятности и математическую статистику. Он помнит все, что когда-либо слышал, видел или читал. Михаил узнаёт, что у его сына-подростка опасное генетическое заболевание, лечение которого потребует многомиллионной суммы. Продав квартиру, Нефедов делает идеально просчитанную ставку на матч местной футбольной лиги, но проигрывает. Ошибиться он не мог, а значит, в уравнении есть неучтенная переменная. И это — подпольный букмекерский бизнес, где результаты игр подтасовываются для извлечения нелегального дохода. Михаил вычисляет организаторов теневого бизнеса и требует у них свой выигрыш. Так начинается война университетского преподавателя с букмекерской мафией.

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: В Смоленской области, в 50 км от границы с Беларусью, есть деревня Шапы, которая, в прямом смысле слова, спасла сама себя. Случилось это, когда 13 лет назад в единственной местной школе "закончились" дети. Учеников стало так мало, что школа оказалась под угрозой закрытия. И это значило, что в деревне больше не останется молодых семей с детьми, что всё просто разъедутся. И тогда трое учителей решились на отчаянный поступок — они взяли из интерната 5 детей с тем, чтобы усыновить их. После чего, их примеру последовала почти вся деревня.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Список желаний
programme.desc: Менеджер туркомпании Маша Синицына случайно узнает, что серьезно больна - предполагается онкологическое заболевание. Потеряв много лет назад отца с таким же диагнозом, Маша не хочет просто ждать конца, она составляет список желаний - того, что хочет сделать в оставшееся ей время… Она меняется: делает прическу, едет отдыхать, красиво одевается.В горнолыжном курорте, где Маша отдыхает, поселяется Алексей. Алексею выделяют личного экскурсовода, которую тоже зовут Маша. Алексей знакомится с Маша и думает, что она тот самый экскурсовод. Маша же не теряется и соглашается с тем, что она экскурсовод и начинает его развлекать.

programme.title: Список желаний
programme.desc: Во время катания на лыжах начинается буря. Наши герои ночуют в маленьком домике. Утром их привозят в гостиницу, и там Алексей узнает, что Маша вовсе не экскурсовод, а та сотрудница, которая сорвала концерт. Маша возвращается домой. Алексей назначает встречу Маше в ресторане. Они ссорятся и Маше становится плохо, Алексей привозит ее в больницу. У нее оказывается приступ острого колита. В больнице, по радио, девушка узнает, что Алексей женится.

programme.title: Список желаний
programme.desc: Маша понимает, что Никита любит ее. Она выходит из больницы и продолжает осуществлять свои мечты и исправлять ошибки. Находит давнего поклонника матери и просит у него прощения. Ведь, когда-то именно она была причиной их расставания.

programme.title: Список желаний
programme.desc: Здоровье Маше становится хуже, поэтому Никита решается все рассказать Алексею. Он приходит к Маше и признается ей в любви, а потом начинает осуществлять все ее мечты и заботится, также он предлагает ей руку и сердце. Маша выжила и решила загадать новые желания, ведь доктора дали ей полгода, а прошел уже год…

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: "Неизвестная Россия" - авторский проект Вадима Кондакова. Это получасовые документальные истории о местах и людях, о которых мало кто знает. И которые станут для зрителя настоящим открытием. Автор побывал в самой самой западной точке страны, в Калининграде, где люди, без света и воды, живут в казематах заброшенного немецкого форта XIX века. И на далеких Курильских островах, в городе-призраке, про жителей которых почему-то забыли на материке. Кроме того, "Неизвестная Россия" расскажет о том, что за таинственный сигнал из космоса поймали в астрофизической обсерватории Нижнего Архыза. И можно ли стать дорожным полицейским, если ты родился в городе дальнобойщиков. В общем, "Неизвестная Россия" показывает страну такой, какой ее не знают даже сами россияне.

programme.title: Дочь за отца
programme.desc: Счастливая жизнь Веры заканчивается в один день. Она узнаёт, что её отец сядет в тюрьму по ложному обвинению в коррупции и убийстве. Вера намерена выяснить правду, найти настоящих виновных в преступлениях и вытащить отца из тюрьмы. Она устраивается работать в компанию, руководитель которой и подставил её отца, но неожиданно для себя влюбляется в своего главного врага...

programme.title: Дочь за отца
programme.desc: Счастливая жизнь Веры заканчивается в один день. Она узнаёт, что её отец сядет в тюрьму по ложному обвинению в коррупции и убийстве. Вера намерена выяснить правду, найти настоящих виновных в преступлениях и вытащить отца из тюрьмы. Она устраивается работать в компанию, руководитель которой и подставил её отца, но неожиданно для себя влюбляется в своего главного врага...

programme.title: Орёл и Решка. Земляне
programme.desc: А вы знали, что эфиопы единственные во всей Африке исповедуют православие, на их календаре сейчас 2017 год, а большинство населения не умеет писать даже собственное имя? Большая часть населения Эфиопии живет на $2 в день, а человек, который может заплатить за билет на самолет, уже считается элитой. Однако здесь есть и долларовые миллионеры. Первый признак VIP-жилья - забор с колючей проволокой.

programme.title: Я иду тебя искать
programme.desc: Мила Пятница и её симпатичный напарник Максим Швец расследуют убийство заместителя директора Дома ветеранов труда. Кому помешал скромный пожилой человек? Один из последних звонков в его телефоне был от некой Кати Одинцовой. Выясняется, что девушка также убита. Чтобы найти разгадку, Мила погружается в прошлое – тем более, что в настоящем она совершенно запуталась. Дружба с Гошей неконтролируемо перетекает в роман, а отношения с отцом окончательно портятся.

programme.title: Заступники
programme.desc: На процессе о шпионаже военный трибунал настроен против "предателя" Резникова, судья отклоняет все доводы Нины. Бруштейн, представляющий второго обвиняемого, перекладывает всю вину на клиента Метлицкой. Однако Нина упрямо ведет защиту, и Быков требует, чтобы её уволили. Нина не подозревает, что её бескомпромиссная позиция используется силовыми ведомствами в борьбе за власть. Врач предупреждает Нину, что беременность сложная, советует лечь в больницу на сохранение. Но Нина не может оставить своего клиента без помощи.

programme.title: Теория больших денег
programme.desc: Гений математики Михаил Нефедов преподает в университете теорию вероятности и математическую статистику. Он помнит все, что когда-либо слышал, видел или читал. Михаил узнаёт, что у его сына-подростка опасное генетическое заболевание, лечение которого потребует многомиллионной суммы. Продав квартиру, Нефедов делает идеально просчитанную ставку на матч местной футбольной лиги, но проигрывает. Ошибиться он не мог, а значит, в уравнении есть неучтенная переменная. И это — подпольный букмекерский бизнес, где результаты игр подтасовываются для извлечения нелегального дохода. Михаил вычисляет организаторов теневого бизнеса и требует у них свой выигрыш. Так начинается война университетского преподавателя с букмекерской мафией.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера. Родители юного гения не разделяют увлечения сына наукой: его мать очень религиозна, а отец, бывший футбольный тренер, предпочитает проводить вечера в компании пива и телевизора. Со сверстниками тоже не ладится, ведь Шелдона куда больше детских игрушек интересует, где можно взять обогащённый уран для научных экспериментов.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера.
